void.string: John Passmore lecture. 13. Aug. ‘2013. Beyond Second Best: Unfolding a Fallacy of Approximation. ... C. Smart. He also appointed the late John Harsanyi, whose work in social choice theory was recognised by the award of a Nobel Prize in Economics.
